Package org.cvs.data.repositories

Interface SkillRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Skill,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Skill,​java.lang.Long>
public interface SkillRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Skill,​java.lang.Long>
Provides CRUD operations for Skill.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamiko J. Msosa
